com.liferay.apio.architect.pagination

Interface Pagination


  • @ProviderType
public interface Pagination
    Defines pagination for a collection endpoint. An instance of this class is handed to resources that handle pagination parameters.
    See Also:
    Page

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEndPosition()
      Returns the position of the requested page's last element.
      int getItemsPerPage()
      Returns the selected number of items per page.
      int getPageNumber()
      Returns the requested page's number.
      int getStartPosition()
      Returns the position of the requested page's first element.
